Description:
Work closely with product managers and developers to deliver polished designs
Own both the interaction and visual design of the products and portals, defining consistent UI components and guidelines following well-established patterns and standards.
You're comfortable with all stages of the design process, from discovery to delivery.
You will have to understand and visualize complex systems, from business concepts over data sets to design system components.
Designing and implementing intuitive user interfaces for web and mobile applications
Creating wireframes and prototypes to aid in design and development
Collaborating with development teams to ensure designs are functional and adaptable
Implementing user feedback and testing to refine designs
Assist in creating visually appealing digital and print materials, such as brochures, social media graphics, and presentations.
Take conceptual ideas and translate them into visually appealing designs for both print and electronic media, ensuring they align with the overall event theme and brand guidelines.
Develop a deep understanding of the design requirements and objectives for each project.
Create visually engaging and persuasive proposal designs, sales decks, and client proposal presentations that effectively communicate our services and offerings to clients.Skills
Skills:
Minimum 4 years of experience in UX/UI Design and Graphic Design designing native apps, web and materials.
Proficiency in industry-standard design software (Figma, Photoshop, Adobe illustrator, Adobe XD)
Exceptional Skills in Visual Design, UX Design, Prototyping, User Research, UI Design and Design-Thinking
Passionate in Graphic Designing and UX/UI design.
Understanding of how user research should be integrated into a project and a good understanding of all the other relevant skill sets, including Business Design, IT, Brand and Marketing.
Strong Knowledge of Microsoft Office Suite (Word, Powerpoint, Excel)
Ability to understand business requirements and user needs and transform them into functional design proposals.
Obsessive attention to detail and good taste in layout, typography and visual hierarchy.
You have excellent knowledge of digital design and visual theory (i.e., composition, color theory, typography, etc.), a sharp eye for layout design, and a strong affinity for the latest design trends, along with a mastery of freehand illustrations and/or digital drawings.
Must be fluent in Arabic & English
